ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger rum based coffee liqueur, (e.g. Tia Maria)
des: "A great flavored martini...with a kicker...chocolate! Chocolate and coffee liqueurs mixed with vodka and topped with a cherry."
ins: In a shaker filled with ice, pour in the liqueurs and vodka. Shake lightly and pour into a Martini glass. Garnish with the cherry.
